title: dog_food_bag_opened_20kg
summary: Opening a 20 kg bag of dog food for daily feeding.
description: This data unit records the opening of a 20-kilogram bag of dry dog food at MaMeeFarm. The food is intended for nine dogs living on the farm and is part of routine animal care and daily feeding operations.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
